what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Benign Essential Blepharospasm ?,"The NINDS supports a broad program of research on disorders of the nervous system, including BEB. Much of this research is aimed at increasing understanding of these disorders and finding ways to prevent, treat, and cure them.",NINDS,Benign Essential Blepharospasm
